attributes.action: Review Toll prices on roads and bridges (e.g. Humber Bridge) with the intension of either scrapping tolls or implementing discounts for those drivers who form part of a car share for the purposes of travel to and from work on a daily basis.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Car Shares are an environmentally friendly and cost effective means of transport. The provision of discounts or the removal of tolls for such drivers would help encourage people to operate in this way.
